string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: Added export and import of settings (extra features)
Added the ability to quickly specify the type for an undefined event (long tap on the event)
A setting for what to do with unrecognized events has been added to the import settings
Added selection of the algorithm for setting birthdays as jubilee in the event list settings (extra feature). Every 10 years by default
The quiz is classified as an extra feature
Added the ability to display contact notes and a description of calendar events (for the main events list)
The maximum event start index in widget preference has been increased from 7 to 20
Events remain merged, hidden, or silent even if an address book contact is merged with a contact from another contact provider (WhatsApp, Telegram, Skype)
Fixed minor bugs
All name variations are used for searching contact names (with and w/o second names)
Added the ability to add unrecorded male names (in addition to female ones)
Added display of age in the main list for all events (not only birthday and death anniversary)
Added the ability to define repetition periods (for events with a filled year)
Added age format setting (numbers only, separate thousands places, replace 000 with \"K\")
New filters added for day counters and unrecognized events ( ‚ãÆ -> Filter‚Ä¶ )
Added star display for calendar and file events linked to favorite contacts
Debug and informational messages are turning on by different switches (informational messages are enabled by default)
Fixed duplicate results for Quick Search
Fixed display of incomplete names (names lists are used for analysis)
Fixed age calculation for calendar events that do not have a link to a contact
Fixed recognizing error for custom events in contacts
Fixed error reading UTF-8 BOM encoded files
Moved contacts accounts selection to the \"Event Setup\" section, added support for selecting from local accounts and the ability don\'t use address book events
Added support for files with multiple event types
Added support for calendars containing multiple types of events
Added support for format of \"Birthdays\" application (description in \"Questions and Answers\")
Added display of events count when selecting accounts, calendars, files
Added quick links (button \"?\") to the corresponding \"Questions and Answers\" sections from some setting screens
Event import settings moved to separate category under event sources. There you can specify the name formats for importing calendar and file events
Events from files can now be hidden and notifications can be turned off for them
Bug fixes and faster loading of events
Corrected theme colors. Added themes: orange, teal, brown, indigo
Added adjustment of horizontal margins to main events list
Added app icon selection
New context action: Share event
The application language can be selected in system settings (Android 13+, set \"System language\" in application settings)
Added new elements to list widgets: event separator, settings button, date brackets, zodiac sign, etc.
New option for displaying notifications: today\'s events are shown as separate notifications, and all the rest (for the specified days) - as a summary list
Notification periods extended to 14 days (you can choose any days)
In the advanced settings of the event list, it\'s possible to enter custom caption for today events
You can give permission to access contacts or calendars through Settings->Help
Optimizations and bug fixes
Events amount in list widgets can be limited by the event count and (or) by days
If event list is empty summary info for all parameters is displaying
Fast scrolling of events is disabled by default and can be enabled in events list settings
Fixed event list composing with very lange font sizing
Fixed taking read permissions for files with events
Fixed updating list widgets when changing screen orientation or resizing the widget (for Android 12+)
The settings menu has become more compact (but there is a new setting to return the old look)
Added event details magnify setting for event list
Size scaling is enabled for the widget for 5 events (but this widget is only for case of instability of widget for 1‚Äì7 events)
Event date display added to list photo widget
Added the \"Extra features\" checkbox to common settings, when enabled, all application settings become available
Optimizations and bug fixes
Added contacts photo style parameters: oval, circle
File events now support Before the Common Era dates (more details in the \"How to\" guide)
Added support for highly recurring calendar events (once a month, once a week, or more often)
If age is less than 1 year, days and months are displayed
Large events number processing optimizations (> 5000)
New event details have been added to list widget constructor: new line (3pcs), days before event, day of week
Notification time can be set up to the minute
Added the ability to search for events through device global search (QuickSearchBox)
Fixed error calculating calendar dates for timezones west of UTC
New color theme: blue-grey
Decorations added: displaying events in a flat list or in the form of cards, as well as the possibility of gradient filling with color (for more details, see the event list settings)
Added 3 additional icon sets for contacts without photos
New context event action: Create contact (the date is inserted into the note)
New event details have been added to list widget constructor: event source icon and web link presence
New application name: \"Birthdays & Events\"
Added the ability to change main event list caption
Added event display constructor for list widget
Parameter \"Events list->Event details->Photo\" now allows to display list of events without any photo
All calendar events are processed, not just all-day events
Added more event details to on/off in widget preferences
Added the ability to customize set of elements for each widget
Added background color setting for widgets
Bug fixes and various optimizations
Added support for external web links for all types of events (more details in the \"How to\" guide)
An icon with hints on the format of queries has been added to the search bar
For events list, widgets and notifications on click response settings have been added: open contact card, web link, event list, ‚Ä¶

Bugs fixing:
 - fixed forced widget update
 - returned bright green to adjust event color and age
 - fixed colors of buttons in dialogs in green theme
 - fixed merging of several birthdays from different calendars
 - fixed duplicate notifications
 - fixed notifications sound changing
Added support for events and birthdays from local files (see \"How to\" guide for file format)
Corrected events sorting inside one day (descending): birthdays, anniversaries, custom events, other events. Events with notify has higher priority
Events with year are displaying on list widget in full format
Updated \"How to\" guide
Android 11 and 12 optimizations
Added setting for forced widgets update
Added warning about enabled battery optimization
Added event list widget with contact photos
Added event list widget
Added widget icon for silenced evens
Added color customizing for event list (today, soon, jubilee)
Added date format customizing
Added \"Close\" quick action for high priority notifications
Added possibility to specify additional female names
Added support for dates in dd/mm/yyyy, mm/dd/yyyy, dd/mm formats
Fixed some bugs
Quiz about the events of your contacts. Launch it from app menu or quick action (on app icon). If the question seems tricky, use üîç to find answer
\"Two weeks before\" was added to \"Notification period\"
Fixed errors in displaying data on widgets, added the ability to display contact organization, new color selection dialogs
Improved algorithm for automatic search for contacts for a calendar event
Added the ability to manually specify a contact for a calendar event (Birthday)
Added button for open widget settings for Samsung devices
Updated list of female names
Notifications can be set ongoing and high priority
In \"Alarm hour\" added midnight - congratulate the birthday boy suddenly!
Multiple notification periods can be selected
Added blue color theme
In widget caption added \"Event type\" and \"Original event label\"
German translation updated (Thanks, Marko)
Fixed some bugs
Added Spain translation
Added display of zodiac signs
Fixed search for several parameters at once (see \"How to\" guide)
Fixed some bugs
Android 11 ready
Added \"How to\" guide with FAQs
Added separate birthday calendar support with contact name recognition rules
Added calendar title display in event details
Search results are not reset when opening a contact card and returning back
Fixed non scrolling widget setting dialog for small screens
Fixed recurring calendar events support
Event types are configured separately for the list, notifications and each widget
Added actions \"Hide\", \"Disable\", \"Dial\" for single notification (+ preference)
Current age in the events list
Calendar events support (Events customizing->Other Event->Calendars)
Hiding and disabling notifications for single custom event
Fixed theme colors and other bugs
Events search interface has been redone
Button \"+\" to add new contact event
Menu item \"Open contact card\" is replaced by \"Edit contact\"
Returned support for horizontal screen orientation
Localizations update and some UI optimizations
Added support for notifications with a melody from external storage. You must give permission to access
Added ability to disable notification of an individual event
Added contact nicknames support
Additions to event context menu: set event reminder, a list of all named weddings
Added application shortcut for notifications recall (Android 7.1+)
Fixed display of dates without a year on Huawei devices
Fixed display \"Surname N.P.\" for contacts with a suffix or prefix in the name
Fixed widgets display on tablets with Android 5.x
Scalable widget update: now all events should fit exactly the entire width of the widget
The preferences for each widget can now be edited. To call the settings, you need to click on caption of the rightmost event on the widget
For scalable widget added ability to adjust the number of displayed events and font magnify factor (widget settings)
Single notification can be postponed for 1 hour
Added version history to About dialog
Analysis of the name has been changed: if job position of the contact is not specified, then everything that is inside the brackets in the full name is the position
Increased photo height on widgets
Switches for event details visibility in settings have been redone into lists
Silhouettes for elder persons (from 65 years old) added
Bugs fixing
Widgets layout fixing
Corrections in Ukrainian translation (thanks @Esperanzzza)
Added option not to show widget frame
Added highlighting of favorite contacts with star sign
Added second text row for person info (on widgets)
Added setting for displaying the name in the list (first name or last name at first)
List of known anniversaries titles (by year): Settings->Events customizing->Anniversary->List
Bugs fixing
Change of the language or color theme applied instantly
Accounts selection for events scanning
Added support for USA dates format in Skype
Added display of just first name under the photo in widgets
Switched to SDK version 29 and migrated to AndroidX library
Hiding individual events
Customizable notification ringtone
Fixed initialization of notifications after reboot
Added dialog about the absence of events in the address book
UI improvements and notifications bugs fixing
Widgets size fixing (again)
Start building a context menu for events
If notifications format is separate messages, then the events now appear in the reverse order (at the top are the nearest)
The number of days before the event is added to the notification
Added marking photos of deceased contacts with a mourning tape
Bug fixing
Added notifications of upcoming events. Turn on in settings
Android 10 ready
Added German localization
\"Find\" function switched to regexp, so you can find via complex queries. Examples - in the program description
Added option to display the original label of a custom event
Bugfixing
Added shading of previous events
Bugs fixing
Added 5 user-defined custom events
Added new events display options
Added previous events displaying on list top
Bugs fixing
Minor color themes corrections
Landscape mode disabled
Added weekday displaying for evens in list
Bugs fixing
Finished dark gray and black color themes
Customization of the definition of user events is implemented (you can use standard names or set your own). This setting is used to display, not to filter events
Minor bugs fixed
Added Ukrainian translation
Added event details option for list: event type, contact title and organization and so on
Some theme colors changes and events list elements alignment
User pics for persons w/o photos choosing by age and gender (4 variants)

Added configuration for every widget. New settings: event starting index and font magnify factor (for resizable 2x2 widget). Now you can make your own event ribbon with any number of one event widgets
Color themes support added. Now there are green, dark gray and full black themes
Since this version minimum Android version is 5.0 (for themes support)
Added layout for 6 and 7 events
Increased font size magnification for widget 2x2
Added 4x1 unresizable widget for 5 events (for devices with non standard screens)
Name-days always parse w/o year
Some bugs fixed
Fixed widget layouts for different display dpi (xhpdi, xxhdpi, xxxhdpi)
Added new setting to hide events icons on widgets
Added elements scaling for 2x2 widget
Improved look for events list
Increased size of photos on widgets
Contacts photos in high resolution
Widget 1x1 became 2x2 (this is new default widget size, it\'s resizable)
Widget 4x1 became resizable (for 1, 2, 4 or 5 events)
Contacts photos in event list cropped by center (for compatibility with non square photos)
Turned on fast scrolling for event list
Added some transparency for widgets background
Added more variants for data bellow photo on widgets
Added color preferences for some widget elements
Added icon for custom event \"Crowning\" (holy mystery in the Eastern Orthodox Church)
Fixed bug with displaying round days event icon
Added support for Skype Lite events for Russian locale
Some small widgets elements alignments
Fixed bug of app language auto selection
Some small widgets elements alignments
First multilingual release
New settings: language selection, bottom photo info selection for widgets, debug dates info is optional now
Bug fixing
